definition: transportation of people or goods by air, especially when other means of access are unavailable, to fly people or goods to or from places not accessible by other means
details:
noun
- transportation of people or goods by air, especially when other means of access are unavailable
= example: transportation of people or goods by air, especially when other means of access are unavailable
= synonyms: lift
verb
- to fly people or goods to or from places not accessible by other means
= example: to fly people or goods to or from places not accessible by other means
= synonyms: lift
